channel.title: I couldn't figure out where to post this
channel.description: It has come to my attention that many people are using other server IPs on the server status page are to maintain a 100 percent uptime, like web hosts and IRC clients. I would assume this would be unjust in the eyes of the Moparscape management. Can these servers be removed from the server status page?

item.title: I couldn't figure out where to post this
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Even if they are removed people will keep on adding them onâ€¦ and i dont see whats bad about advertising servers (btw i think this belongs in questions not here)

Read full topic
